entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Some CNG types no longer warn or throw PNSE in .NET 7 #70637
  • Valgrind on Alpine Linux: Mismatched free() / delete / delete [] #70636
  • Unable to get custom attributes applied to constants using MetadataLoadContext #70634
  • System.IO.FileSystem tests crashing intermittently in CI #70626

Closed

  • Unnecessary instructions produced for records. #70625
  • Test `ClientOptions_TargetHostNull_OK` is failing on Android #70548
    7.0.0
  • Developers can use Generic Math without enabling preview features #63548
    7.0.0
  • Determine recommended behavior of checked/unchecked operators for DateTime and similar types #67744
    7.0.0
  • NativeAOT Library Test Failures Don't Fail CI #70223

PullRequests

Created

  • Use hash one-shots for key adjustment in HMACCommon #70639
    area-System.Security
  • Remove unused code and use Win SDK COM headers instead of checked in versions. #70638
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Use the signature types when building ABI info #70635
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Allow `TYP_STRUCT` `LCL_FLD` on the RHS of block copies #70633
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Revert "? true : false" removal in ArraySortHelper.cs #70631
    area-System.Collections
  • Add end-to-end test for NTLM/Negotiate authentication against fake server #70630
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • EventLogException is missing the original win32 error code #70629
    area-System.Diagnostics.EventLog, community-contribution
  • Revert "Unpin locals (dotnet#70264)" #70627
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • Remove unused code #70624
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Omit calls to CCCryptorFinal #70618
    area-System.Security
  • Forbid creating layout-less `TYP_STRUCT` `LCL_FLD` nodes #70170
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • disable ClientOptions_TargetHostNull_OK on Android #70619
    area-System.Net.Security, test-run-core
  • Fold System.Private.Reflection.Core into CoreLib #70545
    area-System.Reflection
  • Investigate helix error return #70238
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Updated

  • Test additional NativeAOT Lib testing #70212
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: Optimize expansion of indir cell addresses for CFG #70491
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm]: JavaScript interop with [JSImport] and [JSExport] attributes and Roslyn #66304
    arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1820477 #70596
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Optimization for full range checks (#70145) #70222
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Build WasmAppHost with UseAppHost=false #70606
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [mono][wasm] Enable a subset of the gc_pin area optimizations. #70465
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Nullable annotations for System.Security.Cryptography.Xml #67198
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Fixes #64159 - JsonSerializerContext source generation fails with keyword identifiers #66876
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution, source-generator
  • ConfigurationBinder handles ISet<> #68133
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Fix value numbering of HWI loads #70621
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Delete `GTF_ASSERTION_PROP_LONG` #70521
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [Mono] Fix C4018 round I #70417
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • StreamReader sync/async optimizations: ArrayPool, IndexOfAny, ValueStringBuilder #62552
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Precisely track reflected on fields #70546
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • ARM64 - Optimize `i % 2` #70599
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Reduce allocations when using DataContractSerializer with SurrogateTypes #70620
    area-Serialization, community-contribution
  • Restore ArchivingUtils.AttemptSetLastWriteTime #70617
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Unreachable code CodeFixProvider crashes when FixAll is applied #61837
  • `SyntaxList<TNode>` doesn't return the original nodes when passing an `IEnumerable<TNode>` #61836

PullRequests

Created

  • Polish async suggestions #61840
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Serializable option set #61839
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #61842
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Remove unused private members #61064
    Area-Compilers, Community, Next
  • Merge main to features/FixAllNamingViolation #61835
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/DocumentOutline #61834
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/list-patterns #61833
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Fix VB compiler crashes when decoding attributes #61537
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Fix invalid cast when removing unreachable code in top-level programs #61830
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Allow shared projects to specify a real project to proxy too for building and testing in VS Code #60664
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Unwrap the cause (inner exception) of operation canceled exceptions when reporting faults #61787
    Area-IDE
  • Disallow an interface containing or inheriting static abstract/virtual members without implementation as a type argument #61775
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - StaticAbstractMembersInInterfaces

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf improvement: json #42160
  • [QUESTION] Blazor Server SignalR with Azure AD System.Text.Json.JsonReaderException: '<' is an invalid start of a value. LineNumber: 2 | BytePositionInLine: 0 #42159
  • ASP.NET Core SPA Templates Need Better Options for Authentication #42158
  • SPA Proxy works in an unintuitive way #42156
  • The Auto-Generated code for .razor files produce an unfixable warning when using @implements or @inherits with a nullable generic type #42155

Closed

  • Perf improvement: json_nodejs, mvc #42150

PullRequests

Created

  • Less duplicated code in AddControllers #42154
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks

Merged

  • [release/6.0] Remove unneeded + sign #42149
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.7
  • Remove unneeded + sign #42148
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview6

Updated

  • W3CLogger follow-ups #42151
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Http Response fails when writing more than 255MB #41239
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Add option to not cache assembly references in runtime razor compilation #41086
    area-mvc, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • OpenAppPackageFileAsync always returns null stream on iOS simulator #7975
  • Default Template Build Fails #7974
  • DatePicker: Format not working on Windows. VS 2022 - Version 17.3.0 Preview 1.1 #7972
  • Android does not automatically update the manifests with MauiIcon #7971
    6.0-sr2
  • Improve Resizetizer #7970
  • I hate errors so... #7969
  • [MacOS, iOS] ListView and CollectionView on the fly changes don't change the size of the layout #7967
  • Entry changes font family when IsPassword is true #7966
  • Bazor startup not working on Android #7965
  • HasUnevenRows=True and Image in ItemTemplate causes InvalidOperationException #7964
  • ClearButtonVisibility="WhileEditing" does not work in Android #7963
  • IOS ShellContent Icon property disables page navigation #7962
  • Can't use certificate by trusted source while publishing maui blazor app #7961
  • Maui-ios Adding appcenter to MAUI default project throws link error in debug #7959
  • MAUI Templates missing from Visual Studio 2022 Preview 17.3 on macOS #7958
  • iOS AppDelegate - Override for PerformFetch is not available #7957
  • rzc rewritecss exited with code -2147450730. #7955
  • ContentView's OnSizeAllocated method will loaded before controls init in xaml #7954
  • Animation crashes app when size is less than zero #7953

Closed

  • [Android] my custom svg icon is always black on Android #7204
  • App Icon not found error in Android app #5652
    6.0-servicing
  • Appicon cannot be changed #4340
    6.0-servicing
  • Android : Resources/appicon.svg cannot be moved to Resources/Images/appicon.svg #6753
    6.0-servicing
  • Console.WriteLine() does not print out to the console in Blazor MAUI. #7956

PullRequests

Created

  • Automatically add MauiIcon to AndroidManifest.xml #7968
    area/single project ☝️, 6.0-sr2

Updated

  • Fix updating Windows resources at runtime #7830
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, 6.0-sr2
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #7913
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
